boletim.title: BOletim 11-19
boletim.description: BOletim de de abril do dia 12 - 12

boletim.title: Maud Sparrow and the Four Wicked Horses
boletim.description: Once upon a time there was a generous girl called Maud Sparrow. She was on the way to see her Albert Connor, when she decided to take a short cut through Spittleton Woods...

boletim.title: Nefarious Nico Borbaki
boletim.description: Nico Borbaki looked at the enchanted newspaper in his hands and felt conflicted...

boletim.title: Jack Butterscotch | The Dragon
boletim.description: In a hole there lived a tender, silver dragon named Jack Butterscotch. Not an enchanted red, stripy hole, filled with flamingos and a cold smell, nor yet a short, hairy, skinny hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat: it was a dragon-hole, and that means happiness...

boletim.title: Galactic Tiny Arrow Wars
boletim.description: A long, long time ago in a tiny, tiny galaxy...

boletim.title: Club of Gargoyle
boletim.description: Molly Thornhill suspected something was a little off when her creepy daddy tried to club her when she was just six years old. Nevertheless, she lived a relatively normal life among other humans.

boletim.title: Simon Plumb and the Two Kind Gerbils
boletim.description: Once upon a time there was a virtuous boy called Simon Plumb. He was on the way to see his Annie Superhalk, when he decided to take a short cut through Thetford Forest...
